document_data.name: Malthus
document_data.mainbody: '''Malthus''' was a [[Dragonsoul]] of the reborn [[Cult of the Dragon]] that arose as a great threat to the [[Sword Coast]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Abilities: As a spellcaster, Malthus focused on magic that utilized [[acid]]s and [[poison]]ous gas such as the kinf often found in swamps.
document_data.Possessions: Malthus wielded a large, highly-decorated staff in battle.
document_data.History:
During the 1480s DR,{{ToD-time}} Malthus led the cult's efforts to find the grave of the former adventurer [[Belast Massandar]] in [[Neverdeath Graveyard]] in order converse with his spirit. The cult believe that Massandar's spirit could lead them to the resting place of [[Cruven Gantara]], which in turn would allow them access to a ''[[portal]]'' leading to the [[Flame Fault]] on [[Tuern]].

Malthus and his agents were thwarted by the efforts of the [[Harpers]] agent [[Boward]] and her ally, the [[Hero of Sleeping Dragon Bridge]].
